info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central El Paso County through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Colorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Security around 355 PM MDT. Cimarron Hills and Peterson AFB around 400 PM MDT. Falcon around 405 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
